jdbcService.sql: select distinct r.id, r.created, r.modified, r.name, r.pseudo from roles r join group_roles gr on r.id = gr.role_id join groups g on gr.group_id = g.id join user_groups ug on ug.group_id = g.id where ug.user_id = :userId and ug.started is not null and ug.started < current_timestamp and (ug.stopped is null or ug.stopped > current_timestamp) and gr.started is not null and gr.started < current_timestamp and (gr.stopped is null or gr.stopped > current_timestamp)
